text:
When I first booked this Airbnb I never could've predicted how well it would've worked out. Wes is a great host, very personable and made me feel very welcomed to NY. The room was amazing, and I especially loved that it had its own heater! The entire apartment is gorgeous and the amazing amenities offered (rooftop lounge and gym) make it even more top notch.



10/10 would recommend staying at this place!
title: BUDGET LUX C CHARMING CLINTON HILL!
